alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 13 at 2:54PM MST until November 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
